name: ARENA66
description:
ARENA66 is a game about running, dodging and shooting stuff centered around pure skill. Blast your way through different ARENAS, collect the golden skulls and escape quickly to earn a spot on the hiscore.

  • Hard, but fair retro action
  • Amazing music by Wyver9
  • Local and online multiplayer
  • Hiscore for speedrunners
  • Bonuses and achievements
